New-York Historical Society
Sons of the North Social Club records
Sons of the North Social Club, Inc. (Albany, N.Y.)
MS 3141
.21 Linear feet in 1 half-document box.
1935-1956 Meeting minutes, financial accounts, and correspondence of the Sons of the North Social Club, a fraternal organization of Scandinavian-Americans in Albany, New York. For further details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
